price: Disa thanë: “Kush i bëri kështu zotat tanë? Me të vërtetë, ai është keqbërës!”
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
